text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y520 Gaming Laptop: Core i7-7700HQ, NVidia GTX 1060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6" Full HD Display is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo Legion Y520 Gaming Laptop: Core i7-7700HQ, NVidia GTX 1060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6" Full HD Display!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y520 Gaming Laptop: Core i7-7700HQ, NVidia GTX 1060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6" Full HD Display is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Lenovo Legion Y520 Gaming Laptop: Core i7-7700HQ, NVidia GTX 1060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6" Full HD Display is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Lenovo Legion Y520 Gaming Laptop: Core i7-7700HQ, NVidia GTX 1060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6" Full HD Display is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
